document.full_text: a truck driver drove into cars and pedestrians in tel aviv on sunday, an annual palestinian protest day, killing a man and injuring 17 people, and police said they were investigating whether it was a political attack.
document.title: truck crashes into vehicles in tel aviv, 1 dead
lines_and_colors: a truck driver drove into cars and pedestrians in tel aviv on sunday, an annual palestinian protest day, killing a man and injuring 17 people, and police said they were investigating whether it was a political attack.
